subject: GER
title: Experiential Learning and Transcultural Skills Development
description: This course offers an immersive experience in a professional setting in a German-speaking country, company, or community partner. Through extensive written reflection on work tasks, experiences and their cultural environment, students develop German language skills; transcultural skills; and their ability to identify the skills developed in and out of the classroom. [Note: Course will be graded on a CR/NCR basis. Due to the costs involved with working in a foreign country, paid positions are eligible for credit in the course.]
